item.title: The blog's got comments now
item.description: I have added comments to the blog!

item.title: More updates!
item.description: Added a bunch of updates to the site including a Links page and a bunch of updates to the About page. I also redid a bunch of the code to make new pages easier to make and old pages easier to update.

item.title: More slight updates!
item.description: More updates to the visuals, mainly some simple animations. I'm also adding buttons to the About page.

item.title: Updated some visuals of the site
item.description: Slight update to the visuals of the site, including the addition of a little interactive Fennel in the corner, as well as holiday themes.

item.title: God I keep forgetting RSS is a thing
item.description: I totally forgot to update this thing in over a year oops. Check the Updates section on the home page for things you may have missed!

item.title: Site updates!
item.description: Updated the projects and art pages!

item.title: RSS feed is up!
item.description: The RSS feed is online now! More stuff coming soon.
